abstract: Bill Gaytten has been directing the Dior studio while the label seeks a successor to John Galliano.
snippet: Bill Gaytten has been directing the Dior studio while the label seeks a successor to John Galliano.
lead_paragraph: Karlie Kloss closed the Dior show on Friday in a gown with a black lace top and a transparent pink skirt that revealed most of her rear end, a finale that some online commentators read as a pointed statement by its temporary designer. Bill Gaytten has been directing the studio while the label seeks a successor to John Galliano, who was fired in the spring, but Mr. Gaytten has not been seen as a likely candidate for the job since his couture collection, shown in July, was widely panned.
